availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Huffman Paxton in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in March 1852. Father of Mattie Paxton, Bettie Paxton, and Joseph Paxton. Farmer in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 33.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lincoln County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 8.
"James Paxton (1819-1896)," Find A Grave, Memorial 92476836, accessed June 23, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92476836.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Lincoln County Marriages.
